# Dotfusion Digital
>
> Canada's premier headless agency. 25+ years delivering headless CMS websites, mobile apps, eCommerce, and AI solutions.

## About

Dotfusion Digital is a Toronto-based digital agency founded in 1998, specializing in headless CMS architecture, composable commerce, mobile applications, and AI-driven solutions. We are B Corp certified with offices in Toronto and Montreal, serving clients across Canada and globally.

## Services

- Headless CMS Development (Agility CMS, Contentful, Storyblok, Magnolia)
- Mobile & Web Application Development (React, Node.js, Progressive Web Apps)
- Headless eCommerce (Composable commerce, API-first storefronts)
- AI & Automation (Chatbots, Answer Engine Optimization, Content Workflows, MarTech Automation)
- Platform Migration (WordPress, AEM, Sitecore to Headless)
- UX/UI Design Systems (WCAG 2.1 AA compliant, research-driven)

## Key Facts

- Founded: 1998
- Team size: 24 people
- Offices: Toronto, Ontario and Montreal, Quebec
- Languages: English, French
- Certification: B Corp Certified
- Specialization: Headless CMS, Composable Architecture
